Egwuregwu
Ihe nkiri
Nke ka ewuewu
Akụkọ
Egwuregwu
Ihe nkiri
Nke ka ewuewu
Chimamaka  Ihenacho
Broadcast Journalist, Igbo
Ebe foto si, Instagram/Areafada1
Ị nụla maka Charly Boy, mana kedụ ihe ị ma maka nna ya?
Charly Boy bụ otiegwu a ma ama na onye ọnụ na-eru n'okwu n'ihe gbasara ọchịchị na Naịjirịa, mana ị ma na nna ya kpakwara ezigbo ike oge ọ dị ndụ?
Ọkaikpe Chukwudifu Oputa mere ọtụtụ ihe e ji echeta ya n'agbanyeghi na o teela ọ nwụrụ.
Etu Akanu Ibiam si bụrụ onye a ma ama ugbua
Gịnị ka ị nụrụ maka Mbonu Ojike?
A bịa n'ihe gbasara iwu obodo, ide akwụkwọ, ikuzi nkuzi, kpọọ ya aha, o mechara ha niile.
Ebe foto si, areafada1/Instagram
Aha ya bụ Chukwudifu Akunne Sylvester Oputa
A mụrụ ya n'ụbọchị 22 nke ọnwa Septemba 1916, n'obodo Ụmụdei dị n'Ugwuta dị n'Imo steeti
Etu esi hibe ebe a na-akpọ Ugwuta taa
Naanị ya bụ nwa nne ya mụrụ
Ọ gara akwụkwọ praịmarị n'Ugwuta, tupu ọ gaa nke sekọndịrị na Christ the King College (CKC) nke dị n'Ọnịcha, Anambara steeti
Edward James Roye, nwaafọ Igbo bụbu onyeisiala mba Liberia
E zigara ya na nke onye nkuzi a na-akpọ Maazị Azuwuike (Ọ gwara ụmụ ya na onye nkuzi a bụ otu onye o nwere na ndụ ya ọ na-enweghi ike ichefu), ebe ọ nọ gaa ụlọakwụkwọ sekọndịrị
O si ebe ahụ gaa Yaba Higher College tupu ọ gaa Achimota college dị na mba Gana, oge agha mbaụwa nke abụọ malitere, ebe ahụ ka ọ gụrụ 'Economics'

O si ebe ahụ gaa London, ebe ọ nọ gụọ maka ihe mere mgbe gboo nke Bekee kpọrọ History, o mechara gụọ iwu (Law) ma gaa nke a na-akpọ "law school" na mba ahụ, ebe a nọ nye ya ikike ịrụ ọrụ dịka onye ọkaiwu n'afọ 1953
Ọ kwụsịghị ebe ahụ, ọ lọtakwara Naịjirịa bịa mepee ụlọọrụ ndị ọkaiwu ebe ọ rụrụ ọrụ ọtụtụ afọ
O kpere ọtụtụ ikpe gbara ọkpụrụkpụ, nke gụnyere okwu echichi pụtara n'Ugwuta n'afọ 1959 nakwa nke ndị Amayenabo nke ndị Rivas steeti n'afọ 1960
N'afọ 1966 e mere ya Ọkaikpe nke Ụlọikpe ukwu nke dị na mpaghara ọwụwa-anyanwụ
Ebe foto si, Areafada1/Instagram
Chukwudifu Oputa na Nnamdi Azikiwe
N'afọ 1976, e bulie ya n'ọkwa, mee ya ọkaikpe kachasị nke Imo steeti
N'afọ 1984, e mere ya Ọkaikpe ndị Ụlọikpe kachasị na Naịjiria, bụ ebe ọ rụrụ afọ ise tupu ọ laa ezumike nka n'afọ 1989

Onyeisiala Olusegun Obasanjo si n'ezumike nka kpọpụta ya ịbịa nọrọ n'isioche ihe a kpọrọ "Oputa panel" bụ maka nnyocha ikike dịrị onye n'oge ọchịchị ndị agha site n'afọ 1984 ruo afọ 1999 (Human Rights Violation Investigation Commission of Nigeria)
Jụọ ndị na-achị gị ihe ha ji akụnaụba ọha mee - Charly Boy
O dere ma biputa ọtụtụ akwụkwọ karịrị iri anọ, bụ ihe ọ nọ na-arụ n'ọtụtụ afọ ndị ahụ ọ lachara ezumike nka tupu Obasanjo akpọghachị ya ọrụ
Ọ kwụsịghịkwa ikuzi nkuzi, n'ihi na inyefe ndị mmadụ amamihe o nwere masịrị ya nke ukwu
Ọ lụrụ nwunye ya bụ Margaret Ntianu Oputa, ma mụọ ụmụ ise, nke otu n'ime ha bụ Charles 'Charly Boy' Oputa, otiegwu a ma ama, nwa ya ọzọ sorokwara nzọmụkwụ ya wee bụrụ ọkaiwu
Ebe foto si, Areafada1/Instagram
OKaikpe Oputa, Nwunye ya na Charley Boy
Etu nwa ya bụ Charly Boy si kwuo, ọ bụ nwunye Maazị Chukwudifu gbasiri mbọ ike ịhụ na o mechara bụrụ Ọkpaikpe
Oge ọ dị ndụ, e chiri ya echichi 'Ogbuagu'
Otu ihe o jighi gwuo egwu na ndụ ya bụ ihe gbasara Chukwu nakwa okpukperechi; o bu ihe gbasara ụka Katọlik n'isi
Ebe foto si, areafada1/Instagram
Ọkaikpe Oputa na nwa ya 'Areafada'
Onye ndu ndị Katọlik nke bụ Poopu ji aka ya chie ya echichi Knight, e chiri ya Knight of St. Mulumba, Knight commander of St. Gregory the great nakwa Knight of St.Sylvester
O so n'otu n'ime ndị lụrụ agha Burma
Ọ nwụrụ ka ọ dị afọ 98, n'ụbọchị anọ nke ọnwa Mee 2014 ka ọ rịaturu nwaobere ọrịa.
